name: Freekick Stars
description:
Welcome to the best "Free Kicks" Game ever.

Based in Football Super Start 'Giorgio Chiellini', this game provides you tons of time playing, it is surprisingly addictive. Try to score as much goals to beat competitors around the world.


Features:

- Awesome Graphics
- Realistic Wall Players
- Super Real Animations
- Amazing Replay from Different Angles
- Cool music
- Friendly Touch Control
- Incredible Physic Simulations
- Addictive as Sugar

Be ready to get new updates of this game with lot of new features.
Enjoy and tell us what do you think.

Score Goals as a Professional Football Player just now!
